content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1, 1)) with fuel inventory containing 2 coal and working status with 48 iron-ore and 97 iron-plate output.

### Stone Furnace at position (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (3, 0)) with fuel inventory containing 4 coal and no ingredients to smelt.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (1, 1) was full and could not accept more iron-ore.
- Always check the current inventory of the furnace to avoid attempting to insert items when it is full.

### Errors when inserting coal into furnaces
- Make sure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into the furnace. The error occurred when attempting to insert coal into the second stone furnace without having any coal available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to inserting items into furnaces
- Review the insertion logic to ensure that the correct quantity is being inserted and that the target furnace has sufficient inventory space. The error occurred multiple times when attempting to insert iron-ore into the first stone furnace.

### Errors related to crafting new structures
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to craft new entities. The error occurred when trying to craft a new stone furnace without sufficient materials.

### Errors related to insufficient coal for furnaces
- Ensure you have enough coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnaces. The error occurred when there was not enough coal available to insert into the stone furnaces.
